name: Akkabar, City of the wicked
description:
You wake up not knowing where you are or who you are. Around you in the desert are the dead bodies of a caravan that has been plundered. Your only hope is to follow the trail of your attackers. They take you to a city deep in the desert. Akkabar. The green emerald of the desert. Or as other call it. The wicked. You might have been better of dead in the desert.

This is a demo of the the outskirts of Akkabar. Your goal is to manage to get entry to the city so you can continue your search for your attacker and maybe get an answer to who you are.

Control Description

Move player
Interact with character/object
Show/hide inventory
Pause or resume the game

Move to tile or interact with character/object
Rotate camera left or right
Zoom camera in or out

The game is made with rpg-in-a-box by Justin Arnold
